enum.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE
enum.description: Different control settings the MAV state could be in.

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_MANUAL
entry.description: User has control over the MAV

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_ALTITUDE
entry.description: Using a controller which maintains the set altitiude of the MAV.

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_ATTITUDE
entry.description: Using a controller which maintains the set attitude of the MAV.

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_POS_LOCAL
entry.description: TThe user is flying in FPV mode using the onboard camera.

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_POS_GLOBAL
entry.description: Uses global co-ordinate system to fly the MAV

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_POS_RADIAL
entry.description: The co-ordinates used to fly the MAV is relative to the user

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_POS_SPHERICAL
entry.description: The MAV will stay within a set radius around a predefined location

entry.name: MAV_CTRL_MODE_POS_FOLLOW_ME
entry.description: The MAV will follow the GPS

enum.name: MAV_AUTO_MODE
enum.description: A series of MAV states which the MAV could be in based on the user input.

entry.name: MAV_AUTO_MODE_MANUAL
entry.description: Generic autopilot, full support for everything

entry.name: MAV_AUTO_MODE_EMERGENCY_LAND
entry.description: The MAV will initiate an Emergency landing at its current location.

entry.name: MAV_AUTO_MODE_RETURN_TO_HOME
entry.description: The MAV will return from its current position back to the set HOME position at the start of the flight.

entry.name: MAV_AUTO_MODE_WANDER
entry.description: The MAV will travel through the pre-determined waypoints.

enum.name: MAV_KILL
enum.description: Emergency setting to cut off all the power to the MAV if the user chooses to.

entry.name: MAV_KILL_SWITCH_OFF
entry.description: The KILL SWITCH OFF state, which allows the MAV to continue to fly.

entry.name: MAV_KILL_NOW
entry.description: The KILL SWITCH ON state, which forces the MAV drop from the sky.

message.name: Joystick_IO
message.description: Floating point values from Joystick I/O pins (which would be converted to velocity set points using mixing on board)
